source:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_SEQ_00<tab>Hamlyn is quivering in his excitement.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂のハムリンは、解決策を説明したいようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_SEQ_01<tab>It turns out that Hamlyn's master plan to restore peace to the plundered caravan is strikingly similar─if not utterly identical─to the plan you carried out not moments ago. If it will solve your sylph dilemma long enough to get your hands on some glorious eggs, however, you're willing to give it the old Archon try. You head to the Central Shroud and prepare to combat the sylphs' jealous mood with some green of your own.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
※The FATE “Don't Be Sylphish” can only be completed as a Disciple of War or Magic.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

ハムリンたちと話した。中央森林のF.A.T.E.『エッグハント「シルフ対トンベリ人間」』を達成して、アルコンエッグを回収しよう。

※F.A.T.E.『エッグハント「シルフ対トンベリ人間」』は、ファイターか、ソーサラークラスでのみ、達成することができます。

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_SEQ_02<tab>After a frantic scuffle involving sylphs, a giant mammet, and more shuffling than is comfortable for the average tonberry, you manage to recover the scattered Archon eggs. Panting from exertion and pleased to be free of your sweaty guise (once more pawed off you by an overzealous Hamlyn), you trek back to Gridania to give Jihli the good news.
target: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_SEQ_02<tab>F.A.T.E.『エッグハント「シルフ対トンベリ人間」』を達成し、アルコンエッグを回収できた。グリダニアのミィ・ケット野外音楽堂で「ジリ・アリアポー」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_SEQ_03<tab>Hamlyn is singing your praises─or, more accurately, the noble tonberry's praises─with phlegmy excitement when you arrive, lamenting only the absence of large crowds who might have witnessed the miraculous feats performed by his adorable idols. As it turns out, enough townsfolk were present to warrant extending personal thanks for returning their precious eggs─which they ought to decorate <var 1A 02 /var>as<var 1A 01 /var> tonberries to prevent any further sylph shenanigans, Hamlyn helpfully suggests. While Hamlyn could not be less subtle in his tonberry touting, you can't deny the modicum of truth in his suggestion, and really, you'd just like to get on with it already. Jihli smiles and officially proclaims the start of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide─let the eggy, eggy, stabby fun begin!
target: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_SEQ_03<tab>ジリ・アリアポーに報告した。彼女の開会宣言によって、無事に「エッグハント」が始まった。シルフ族のいたずら対策に協力しつつ、トンベリに扮して祝祭を楽しもう。

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_TODO_00<tab>Complete the FATE “Don't Be Sylphish” in the Central Shroud.
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_001<tab>I beg you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─speak with Hamlyn and see how we might recover those Archon eggs!
target: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_001<tab>ハムリンさんの話を聞いてみましょう！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_002<tab>All those eggs... All those beautifully decorated─and <var 1A 02 /var>expensive<var 1A 01 /var>─eggs...
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_002<tab>せっかく腕のいい彫金師さんが、
タマゴを綺麗に加工してくださったのに～……。

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_003<tab>You wish to lend your strength to my brilliant plan, do you? <snort> Very well. Our divine mission is as follows─we must adorn ourselves in the guise of the tonberry, and scare the sylphs away from the fallen eggs!
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_003<tab>思うに、トンベリの着ぐるみを使えば、
アルコンエッグを無事に回収できるんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_004<tab>...Ahem, it may seem like a rather familiar tactic, but terror cuts as sharply as a knife in the right hands. As does the power of the tonberry! <snort> We shall remind those sylphs of what adorable horror lurks in the shadow.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_004<tab>オレにしてみれば、魅力的でしかないトンベリちゃんだが、
シルフ族はとにかく不気味がってビビッている。

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_005<tab>It is time to take the tonberry's naturally winsome and captivating visage and transform it into a mask of pure evil.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_005<tab>恐怖心ってのは、そう簡単に克服できるもんじゃねぇだろ？
一度使った手だが、シルフ族を追い払うなら、
思い切りおどかしてやればいい！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_006<tab>I...suppose that makes sense. But what of the delivery mammet? In its panicked state, it may easily mistake us for naught but common egg-thieves─er, perhaps not so common, considering the guises.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_006<tab>なるほど～！
でも、暴走してる魔法人形への対策はどうしましょう～？
近づいたらタマゴ泥棒と思われて、攻撃されちゃいますぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_007<tab>That's where <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s participation is crucial. <snort> Even an overexcited automaton is no match for an adventurer versed in the arts of warfare!
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_007<tab>そこは<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>たち、冒険者の出番よ！
もし魔法人形が仕掛けてくるなら、戦いの専門家を頼るべきだ。

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_008<tab>Of course, I shan't be so cruel as to send you into battle as defenseless as a swaddled tonbabe.
target: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_008<tab>もちろん、ただ頼むだけじゃないぜ？

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_100_008<tab>You may rely upon me to perform the necessary <shlorp> <var 1A 02 /var>enhancements<var 1A 01 /var> upon your guise, that shall grant any stabby sweetheart the ability to withstand even the harshest of electrified zaps! ...In theory, anyway.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_100_008<tab>なんせ、相手は魔法人形とシルフ族だからな。
連中が放つ雷撃や、雷属性の攻撃魔法を受けたとしても、
ちっとシビれる程度で済むよう、着ぐるみを補強するつもりだ！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_009<tab>In the midst of adversity lies opportunity, as they say─or rather, in the midst of scattered Archon eggs stands the noble tonberry, that all might witness its triumphant glory!
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_009<tab>ククッ、ピンチはチャンスだ！
トンベリの姿でこの問題に対処すれば、
それを見た人々のトンベリへの好感度は爆上がりに違いねぇ！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_010<tab>Very well. Let us proceed with Hamlyn's plan and see that our eggs are recovered safely.
target: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_010<tab>ハムリンさんが提案してくれた方法を、試してみましょう！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_011<tab>Hmhm, excellent! <snort> I shall commence the enhancement of this guise at once and have it ready for deployment in two flicks of a tonberry's blade. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─let us meet where the bells of destiny toll. To arms!
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_011<tab>そうと決まれば、すぐにでも着ぐるみの補強作業にとりかかる！
終わり次第、着ぐるみを持って現地へ向かうから、
中央森林で任務開始だ！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_012<tab>I shall contact the Adventurers' Guild to see if any there are willing to help as well.
target: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_012<tab>冒険者ギルドにも、協力を要請してみるわね！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_013<tab>You'll find the caravan by the Mirror Planks in the Central Shroud. You can't miss it─not even if you tried.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_013<tab>魔法人形が立ち往生しているのは、
中央森林の「鏡池桟橋」のあたりですぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_015<tab>You did it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You truly did it!
target: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_015<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、おつかれさまなのですぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_016<tab>'Twas sheer majesty, the likes of which I have never seen! <heavy breathing>
target: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_016<tab>勇敢に戦うトンベリの姿、最高だったぜ！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_020<tab>And here comes our hero now! Hamlyn has just been regaling us with the tale of your valor, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_020<tab>おかえりなさい、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
先に戻ってきたハムリンさんから、話は聞いたわ！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_021<tab>We can't thank you enough for recovering those Archon eggs. Truly─from the bottom of our hearts and purses─thank you!
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_021<tab>アルコンエッグの回収、
本当に、本当に、助かりましたぁ～！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_023<tab>My single regret is that no rapturous bystanders were present in those solitary woods to witness such valorous displays.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_023<tab>みんなにトンベリの雄姿を見てもらいたかったのに、
ひとけのない森の中だったのが悔やまれるぜ……！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_024<tab>Alas, the tonberry's majesty will once again pass unacknowledged. Yet, such is often the way with true goodness. <snort> The hero that works in secrecy for the betterment of all? My friends, their name is tonberry.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_024<tab>ま、人知れず活躍するトンベリってのも、
それはそれで魅力的だよな！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_025<tab>(-Nonotta-)Profound, I'm sure. I must say, Hamlyn, your unflagging devotion to all things tonberry is both remarkable and admirable...
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_025<tab>(-ノノッタ-)おおう……。
ハムリンさんの底抜けに前向きなところ、見習いたいですぅ～。
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_RESIDENTSB04722_000_026<tab>(-呼びかける女性の声-)あ、あのっ！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_RESIDENTSB04722_000_027<tab><var 1A 02 /var>We<var 1A 01 /var> were in those solitary woods! And we saw what you did for us. ...Er, what the <var 1A 02 /var>tonberries<var 1A 01 /var> did for us.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_RESIDENTSB04722_000_027<tab>トンベリの活躍、
私たちはちゃんと知っているわ！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_RESIDENTSB04722_000_028<tab>I was heartbroken when a sylph snatched away the Archon egg that my friend had given me...
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_RESIDENTSB04722_000_028<tab>私、友達からもらったアルコンエッグを、
シルフ族に持っていかれちゃったんだけど……

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_RESIDENTSB04722_000_029<tab>...But thanks to you, it was recovered safely. You tonberries have my eternal thanks.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_RESIDENTSB04722_000_029<tab>トンベリ姿の実行委員さんが、見つけて届けてくれたのよ！
シルフ族が逃げていくときに落としていったみたいで、
回収しておいてくれて、本当に助かったわ！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_RESIDENTSB04722_000_031<tab>I only wish you didn't have to scare the sylphs so badly. The poor things... Is there no other way to deter their mischief?
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_RESIDENTSB04722_000_031<tab>シルフ族を邪険にしてはかわいそうだけど、
私たち、本当に困っていたから……。
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_A2_000_001<tab>シルフ族除けがあると便利かもしれない

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_033<tab>Indeed! <snort> Consider this─if we decorate our eggs with a tonberry theme, the sylphs wouldn't dare snatch or sabotage them!
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_HAMLYN_000_033<tab>なら、こういうのはどうだ！？
シルフ族のいたずら対策として、
装飾用のタマゴをトンベリ風に塗って飾るってのは！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_034<tab>A dark green coat on a large egg with two golden circles for eyes? Not bad at all. Perhaps even...cute!
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_034<tab>緑のタマゴに～黄色いタマゴをちょんちょんと描いて～♪
かわいいかもしれないのですぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_035<tab>Jihli, perhaps <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> is what your dream foretold. Not just tonberry guises, but tonberry eggs and decorations as well!
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_035<tab>あ、これってもしかして、ジリちゃんが見た夢……！
「祝祭に参加するトンベリ」って、仮装のことだけじゃなくて、
このトンベリ模様のタマゴのことも示していたのでは～？

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_036<tab>In which case, we should send word to our Ul'dahn goldsmiths that we'd like another batch of Archon eggs in some striking shades of tonberry.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_NONOTTA_000_036<tab>だとすれば、彫金師さんに製作依頼をしたアルコンエッグ、
追加分の一部をトンベリ模様にしてもらうといいかもですね～！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_037<tab>Of course, all our eggs are packaged during transit, meaning the sylphs will likely continue their mischief outside the city. I'm tempted to send a tonberry guard with the caravan, but the road from Ul'dah is far too long to attempt in such a guise.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_037<tab>ただ、運搬中は梱包しているからシルフ族除けにはならないわ。
こりずにあの子たちがいたずらをしてきそうだけど、
さすがに、この格好でウルダハから陸路は大変だろうし……。

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_038<tab>We shall continue to consider possible alternatives, but in the meantime, should you happen to come across another waylaid shipment, I hope I can count on your assistance. Er...as a tonberry, of course.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_038<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
私たちも対策を考えてはみるけど、
もしまた立ち往生しているのを見かけたら……お手伝いしてね？

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_039<tab>Well, seeing as our Archon eggs have finally arrived, I daresay it is time to officially get <var 1A 02 /var>cracking<var 1A 01 /var>! Let the Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities begin!
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_039<tab>さて、アルコンエッグも届いたことだし……
いよいよ「エッグハント」開催よ！

source: TEXT_FESEST902_04722_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>You have unlocked the Egg Hunter Riggy mini-game. To play mini-games, open the toy chest found in any inn room.
target:
TEXT_FESEST902_04722_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>各国の宿屋の客室にある「トイボックス」から、
ミニゲームを遊ぶことができます。
